    • Uses of RequestContextFacade in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRequestContextFacade 
      class  ThreadLocalRequestContextFacade
      Implementation of RequestContextFacade that internally uses InheritableThreadLocal to provide access to the respective RequestContext.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void RequestContextAccessor.setRequestContextFacade(RequestContextFacade requestContextFacade)

      class  HystrixRequestContextFacade
      Implementation of AbstractRequestContextFacade that relies on HystrixRequestVariableDefault to manage RequestContexts.
